alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:22PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walton County through 200 PM CDT... At 122 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eglin Air Force Base, or 9 miles north of Santa Rosa Beach, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Portland, Villa Tasso, Gulf Pines, New Home, Blue Mountain Beach, Rock Hill, Sandestin, Miramar Beach and Four Mile Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
